title: Jo Backaert
text: Joseph Backaert (5 August 1921 – 12 June 1997) was a Belgian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who was a member of the <a href="Belgium%20national%20football%20team">Belgium national team</a> at the <a href="1954%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1954 FIFA World Cup</a>. However, he never earned a <a href="Cap%20%28sport%29">cap</a> for Belgium. He also played for R. Olympic Charleroi C.C.
